person.name: Bart
person.quote: I didn't think it was physically possible, but this both sucks and blows.

person.name: Homer
person.quote: Ah, sweet pity. Where would my love life have been without it?

person.name: Lisa
person.quote: Poor Krusty. He's like a black velvet painting come to life.

person.name: Marge
person.quote: Is he well enough for me to start mothering him unbearably, doctor?

person.name: Lionel
person.quote: If there's one thing America needs, it's more lawyers. Can you imagine a world without lawyers?

person.name: Moe
person.quote: Looks like it's suicide again for me...

person.name: Comic Book
person.quote: There is no groaning in my store
